title: Date and Walnut Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ['125g unsalted butter, softened to room temperature', '5 tablespoons brown soft sugar, firmly packed', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '100g self raising flour', '80g plain flour', '2 tbsp double cream', '100g pitted dried dates, finely chopped', '30g walnuts, finely chopped', 'demerara sugar']
